title: f/s: t206 cobb red polar bear sgc 40 ...gone
author: chaddurbin

posts.post_title: f/s: t206 cobb red polar bear sgc 40 ...gone
posts.post_content:
no longer available delivered via a check.

i don't talk up a card often, but this polar bear is one of the nicest i've seen with minimal staining.  crisp image, square corners.  has a light .5" wrinkle by shoulder (doesn't break to back), but the slight miscut* caused the unjust(?) downgrade imo.

*will examine top border tonight for any sign of a partial name on top so i can call it a freak and mark up 300%.
Chad, you're right, this is a really nice card. :)
You forgot to mention the corners. Those of a 7.
